description: Schema for structuring a story outline with acts, chapters, and events.

^act-\\d+$.description: Represents an act in the story, containing chapters and a title.

title.description: The title or theme of the act.

chapters.description: A list of chapters within the act.

items.description: Represents a chapter in the story.

title.description: A descriptive title summarizing the chapterâ€™s focus.

perspective.description: The name of the character whose point of view this chapter is written from.

characters.description: A list of characters central to the chapter.

events.description: A list of events that occur within the chapter.

items.description: Represents a single story event or beat.

description.description: A detailed summary of the event.

additional_characters.description: Characters involved in this event but not central to the chapter.

emotional_beat.description: The emotional tone or key character development of this event.

sensory_details.description: Specific sensory elements (e.g., sounds, smells, visuals) to guide descriptive writing.

worldbuilding.description: Worldbuilding notes or setting details introduced in this event.

draft_prompt.description: Guidance for drafting the event, focusing on tone or important details.
